name: Count Weenie
description:
My compo entry uses the theme by way of Linear Story X Dynamically Affected Elements.  Also it uses the theme as Vampire X Sausage.

You play as Jo, who recently got turn into a hideous half vampire half sausage half human.  Jo is on a quest to find the dingy's cure the sausagic curse.

The game is top down with an attack button, and a couple extra actions depending on how you play.
The game is suppose to be played as a puzzle and you're unlikely to discover all the mystery on the first try. 
There quite a few npcs to meet and try to figure out how they fit into curing the sausagic curse.

Anyways hope you enjoy. 

I'll post info about the game late https://vidsneezes.wordpress.com/

there's no mute or volume option, but the music gives some hints to the game.!
